short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ai powered browser assistant for use by UltimateAI.org Subscribers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Productivity extension to allow seamless access to Ai for members of UltimateAi.org.
The extension provides quick access to basic Ai features.

Note: An API key from UltimateAI.Org is required to use this extension

Powered by 30+ AI models from the top providers;

3 modes;
Click to on the extension to activate chat
or
Highlight Text and use the AI Context Menus
or
select Text and use the AI However Icons

Update: 1.4 (easier model selection, option to disable AI hover Icons)
